HDG.BC.content: we hear Greek thinkers, must think about fact that everything has to do w/ us [imperative of hermeneutics of facticity]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: we hear Greek thinkers, must think about fact that everything has to do w/ us [imperative of hermeneutics of facticity]

HDG.FS.content: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: Weltlichkeit der Welt (Umweltanalyse) > Heidegger explains how, for first time [in Being and Time], being-in-the-world (In-der-Welt-sein) discovered as primary/irreducible fact, always already given, radically “prior” to consciousness [factical life] > still, this facticity is only “concrete” way of approaching project itself [the guiding aim (das leitende Ziel)] > [facticity subordinate to the Seinsfrage]

HDG.WL.content: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

motif.name: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.WL.linkedContent: a way (Weg): allows us to reach something (lässt gelangen) [arrival] > peculiarity (Eigentümliche) of language conceals itself > that we are allowed to listen, we belong to language, this belonging contains actual presence (eigentlich Wesende) of way to language [proximity to facticity of language] > essence of Saying will only make itself manifest (bekunden) if we attend (achten) w/ great instancy to what the foregoing Erläuterung has offered

HDG.OHF.content: “Facticity (Faktizität),” designation (Bezeichnung) for the Seinscharakter of “our” “own” Dasein: “this” Dasein in its Jeweiligkeit, Verweilen [see TN endnote p. 102 for extensive explanation of neologism here], “its being-there for awhile at the particular time,” insofar as it is “there” in the manner of be-ing > Dasein is there for itself in the how (Wie) of its ownmost being (seines eigensten Seins) > “Being—transitive: to be factical life!” > Being not the possible object of a having (Habens) [dispossession]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “Facticity (Faktizität),” designation (Bezeichnung) for the Seinscharakter of “our” “own” Dasein: “this” Dasein in its Jeweiligkeit, Verweilen [see TN endnote p. 102 for extensive explanation of neologism here], “its being-there for awhile at the particular time,” insofar as it is “there” in the manner of be-ing > Dasein is there for itself in the how (Wie) of its ownmost being (seines eigensten Seins) > “Being—transitive: to be factical life!” > Being not the possible object of a having (Habens) [dispossession]

HDG.OHF.content: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: hermenutics: wakefulness (Wachsein) of Dasein for itself (not conventional understanding) > interpreting is a being, a distinctive how of character of being of facticity, that belongs to factical life itself (facticity not the object of hermeneutics) > chance that hermeneutics will go wrong belongs to its ownmost being

HDG.OHF.content: being of factical life is distinctive: it is in the how of the being of its being-possible > authentic be-ing itself places (gestellt) facticity into our forehaving (Vorhabe) > the explicata that grow out of this interpretation: existentials

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: being of factical life is distinctive: it is in the how of the being of its being-possible > authentic be-ing itself places (gestellt) facticity into our forehaving (Vorhabe) > the explicata that grow out of this interpretation: existentials

HDG.OHF.content: the hermeneutical Einsatz (engagement/bringing into play), that “with respect to, on the basis of which, and with a view to” all is a card staked (gesetzt) [risk, change, play], the “as what” in which facticity is grasped/stirred, not something that can be fabricated (erfunden), not a readymade possession, arises from a fundamental experience (Grunderfahrung): a philosophical wakefulness (Wachsein), Dasein encounters itself (ihm selbst begegnet)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: the hermeneutical Einsatz (engagement/bringing into play), that “with respect to, on the basis of which, and with a view to” all is a card staked (gesetzt) [risk, change, play], the “as what” in which facticity is grasped/stirred, not something that can be fabricated (erfunden), not a readymade possession, arises from a fundamental experience (Grunderfahrung): a philosophical wakefulness (Wachsein), Dasein encounters itself (ihm selbst begegnet)

HDG.OHF.content: everything modern steals away from its own time (industry, propaganda, creating “effect” only in fashion) > Dasein encounters itself, its Seinscharakter, not a matter for universal humanity or a public, but, in each case (je), definite/decisive possibility of concrete facticity

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: everything modern steals away from its own time (industry, propaganda, creating “effect” only in fashion) > Dasein encounters itself, its Seinscharakter, not a matter for universal humanity or a public, but, in each case (je), definite/decisive possibility of concrete facticity

HDG.OHF.content: all talking about hermeneutics misunderstands it, the wakefulness for facticity must temporalize/unfold “there” > hermeneutics [Heidegger admits to making a personal statement] not philosophy at all, something preliminary (Vorläufiges), has its own explanation (Bewandtnis) for being: what’s at issue in it, not to be finished quickly, rather to hold out in it as long as possible (möglichste lange darin auszuhalten) [slow down] > we’ve become so weak-kneed, pithless, can’t hold out in asking a qustion

HDG.OHF.content: [series of historical quotes on (Christian) concept of “Man” (Paul, Tatian, Augustine, Aquinas, Zwingli, Calvin, Scheler)] Scheler: man is intention/gesture of transcendence itself, gateway for grace, theo-morphism, an X which is finite/living image of God [Heidegger proclaims: “clear enough: a panorama! a picture, a story (Roman)!”] > Scheler ruins both theology/philosophy: a method of looking away (Hinwegsehens) from facticity

motif.name: GOD in DES TOURS DES BABEL
motif.title: GOD in DES TOURS DES BABEL

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [series of historical quotes on (Christian) concept of “Man” (Paul, Tatian, Augustine, Aquinas, Zwingli, Calvin, Scheler)] Scheler: man is intention/gesture of transcendence itself, gateway for grace, theo-morphism, an X which is finite/living image of God [Heidegger proclaims: “clear enough: a panorama! a picture, a story (Roman)!”] > Scheler ruins both theology/philosophy: a method of looking away (Hinwegsehens) from facticity

HDG.OHF.content: in its traditional categorial forms (Prägungen) [stamps], concept man fundamentally obstructs view to facticity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: in its traditional categorial forms (Prägungen) [stamps], concept man fundamentally obstructs view to facticity

HDG.OHF.content: defined as Dasein’s own, facticity contains nothing of “ego,” person, “ego-pole,” Aktzentrum ——initial approach (ersten Ansetzen) to “object” of hermeneutical explication must hold fast (halten) to directive (Weisung) co-given in advance in concept of facticity, the possible direction of filling it out (mögliche Erfüllungsrichtung)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: defined as Dasein’s own, facticity contains nothing of “ego,” person, “ego-pole,” Aktzentrum ——initial approach (ersten Ansetzen) to “object” of hermeneutical explication must hold fast (halten) to directive (Weisung) co-given in advance in concept of facticity, the possible direction of filling it out (mögliche Erfüllungsrichtung)

HDG.OHF.content: grasp facticity w/ view to primordiality followed to the end > must be wide awake for specific categories of Dasein, must be brought into view in public manner (having-been-interpreted in the today)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: grasp facticity w/ view to primordiality followed to the end > must be wide awake for specific categories of Dasein, must be brought into view in public manner (having-been-interpreted in the today)

HDG.OHF.content: [method: summary of how to hermeneut “today”] today only fully defined in ontological character as a how of facticity (existence) when we make visible “temporality” (existential not category) as fundamental phenomenon of facticity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method: summary of how to hermeneut “today”] today only fully defined in ontological character as a how of facticity (existence) when we make visible “temporality” (existential not category) as fundamental phenomenon of facticity

HDG.OHF.content: as open space of publicness, nothing eludes the talk: averageness (Durchschnittlichkeit), discusses everything w/ insensitivity to difference (Unterschiedsunempfindlichkeit) > Öffentlichkeit as being of “Man (every-one)”: everyone says that, everyone expects that, talk in circulation belongs to no one [Irigaray] > “Man” = “Niemand” > Dasein haunted like a specter by this circulation, a how of factical life that pays tribute to the fateful undoing (Verhängnisses) of facticity

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.OHF.content: [method, quasi-destruction: we must kneed out ontological access to facticity from the initial public givens of being-interpreted, from average talk]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method, quasi-destruction: we must kneed out ontological access to facticity from the initial public givens of being-interpreted, from average talk]

HDG.OHF.content: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?

motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [method] [from] as what is factical Dasein being encountered in historical consciousness & philosophy? [to] what does factical Dasein have itself in these interpretations? [to] what is the having-itself-there of Da-sein as being, as a How of facticity, as an existential?

HDG.OHF.content: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]

HDG.OHF.content: “Aufhalten bei,” eine Vollzugs- und Zeitigungsweise > philosophical research as a definite kind of sojourning at home in, holding out there: facticity is what is primordial
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “Aufhalten bei,” eine Vollzugs- und Zeitigungsweise > philosophical research as a definite kind of sojourning at home in, holding out there: facticity is what is primordial

HDG.OHF.content: der Einsatz (initial engagement & bringing into play), “as what” facticity is grasped/stirred in advance, arises out of fundamental experience, out of truth of primordial self-interpretation of philosophy
